title: The Hills star Lauren Conrad and husband welcome ‘sweet baby boy’
text:
Lauren Conrad welcomes baby boy (Picture: Getty/Instagram)

Lauren Conrad has welcomed a baby boy, whom she has named Charlie.

The former reality star turned fashion designer revealed the news on Instagram, sharing a sweet illustration of her family.

‘Our sweet baby boy, Charlie Wolf Tell, has arrived!’ she captioned the picture.

Lauren is already mum to two-year-old son Liam, who she welcomed with hubby William Tell back in July 2017.

Lauren confirmed she was pregnant again in April by debuting her baby bump with a very cute snap on Instagram, where she was seen with her arms wrapped around her stomach.

It’s a boy! (Picture: Inastagram)

The 33-year-old told her 6.1million followers: ‘It’s been hard to keep this one to myself! Very excited to share that our family will be getting a little bigger this year.’

While pregnant first time round, Lauren admitted that she had ‘freaked out’ over finding out she was having a baby and her panic caused her to confide in her best friend first.

Lauren and William married in 2014 (Picture: Getty Images)

She told People: ‘I wanted to be able to tell our parents later in a calmer, celebratory fashion. But my girlfriend has known me since elementary school, so she was my first choice for a freak out.’

Lauren and law school graduate and musician William married back in 2014, after two years of dating.

She first shot to fame on reality series Laguna Beach, before making a name for herself on The Hills alongside the likes of Heidi Montag, Spencer Pratt, Whitney Port and Brody Jenner.
